name: Duskblade Of Draktharr
passive: Nightstalker: After takedown, become invisible for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown). Your next attack deals 99 (+30% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Armor, Ability Haste. Passive effect: After takedown, become invisible for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown). Your next attack deals 99 (+30% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: The penetration helps maintain damage relevance as the game progresses
Great for assassins looking to eliminate priority targets
Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
